com.koucha.experimentalgame.rendering

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.koucha.experimentalgame.rendering.Line
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable

    public class Line
extends java.lang.Object
implements Renderable
    Represents a Line that can be rendered

    • Constructor Detail

      • Line

        public Line(float startX,
            float startY,
            float endX,
            float endY,
            float width,
            java.awt.Color color)
        Creates a Line that goes from (startX, startY) to (endX, endY)
        Parameters:
        startX - x coordinate of the beginning of the line
        startY - y coordinate of the beginning of the line
        endX - x coordinate of the ending of the line
        endY - y coordinate of the ending of the line
        width - width of the line
        color - line color
